400.description: No file provided or invalid file

example: password must be longer than or equal to 6 characters

post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password
Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token

get.description: Gets the profile information of the authenticated user
Redirects the user to Google OAuth page
Handles Google OAuth response and redirects to frontend with tokens

post.description: Creates a new service with the provided information

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of services with optional filtering options

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Search radius in meters for location-based filtering

parameters.name: onlyActives
parameters.description: Filter only active services (true) or all services (false)

200.description: Paginated list of services retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves a specific service by its ID

patch.description: Updates an existing service with new information

delete.description: Permanently deletes a service from the system

Retrieves the availability of a service for a specific date

patch.description: Updates an existing category with new information

delete.description: Permanently deletes a category from the system

post.description: Creates a new contract between a client and a service provider

requestBody.description: Contract creation data including service, client, provider, and time slots

example1.description: Create a contract for a cleaning service

201.description: Contract created successfully with payment link

400.description: Invalid input data or service not available

message.example: Service not available for requested time slots

404.description: Service, client, or provider not found

get.description: Retrieves all contracts in the system (admin only)
Retrieves all contracts where the authenticated user is either client or provider

clientContracts.description: Contracts where user is the client

providerContracts.description: Contracts where user is the provider

post.description: Handles Stripe webhook events for payment processing

get.description: Retrieves a specific contract by its ID

patch.description: Updates an existing contract with new information

delete.description: Permanently deletes a contract from the system

400.description: Invalid input data or user already reviewed this service

get.description: Retrieves all reviews for a specific service

get.description: Retrieves all reviews created by a specific user

200.description: List of reviews by the user retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves review statistics and detailed reviews for a specific service

requestBody.description: Favorite creation data including service ID

example1.description: Add a cleaning service to user favorites

400.description: Invalid input data or service already in favorites

get.description: Retrieves all favorites in the system (admin only)

Retrieves a specific favorite by its ID

post.description: Creates a new availability slot for the authenticated user

example: startTime must be a valid time

get.description: Retrieves all availability slots for the authenticated user

200.description: List of user availabilities retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get availabilities by day of week
get.description: Retrieves availability slots for a specific day of the week (0=Sunday, 1=Monday, etc.)

parameters.name: dayOfWeek
parameters.description: Day of week (0-6, where 0 is Sunday)

200.description: List of availabilities for the specified day retrieved successfully

message.example: Day of week must be between 0 and 6

get.description: Retrieves a specific availability slot by its ID

post.description: Updates multiple availability slots at once
Creates a new chat between the authenticated user and a service provider

requestBody.description: Chat creation data including service ID

example1.description: Start a conversation about a cleaning service

message.example: Chat already exists for this service

get.description: Retrieves all chats for the authenticated user

content.example: Perfect! I'll see you tomorrow at 9 AM.
